comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: There was a Nina Napier who performed in at least three Broadway musical shows, 1913-1916: www.ibdb.com/person.php?id=54263

comment.author: 87724873@N00
comment._content: Broadway actress - Katinka [Broadway, Original Broadway Production, 1915] Varenka Iolanthe [Broadway, Unknown, 1913] Fleta The Beggar Student [Broadway, Unknown, 1913] Maid of Honor (Above info from broadwayworld.com) This is possibly a publicity shot for Iolanthe - Info about that play here: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9F02E...

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca and klynslis:  This portrait does resemble the photo of Nina Napier in the New York Times article. Thank you for finding out more about  her.  We will update our source data and reload the description.
